Feature 01

Photo-Verified Visits

Eliminate fake reports. Field staff capture 2 photos—customer and location—with auto-GPS stamps for indisputable proof of every visit.

Feature 03

Offline-First PWA

Sales never stop for bad signal. Our PWA uses IndexedDB to store leads and visit logs locally, syncing automatically via background sockets when online.
